altTitles.ja: はじめてのお嬢様

description.en: Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!
description.ja: 御城琴音は超がつくお嬢様の高校１年生。駅の券売機の使い方が分からず困っているところを通りがかりの高校１年生・瀬和すぐるに助けられたのをきっかけに、瀬和の高校に転校してきた。はじめての電車。はじめてのカレーうどん。はじめての友達。「はじめてを教えて欲しい」お嬢様と世話焼き男子高校生のはじめてラブコメディ！

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.en: Even 'Used Goods' Wants to Experience Love!
Even If It Is Second Hand, I Want to Fall in Love!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu não preciso de uma heroína real

altTitles.ru: Даже использованный товар желает испытать любовь

altTitles.th: มือสองแล้วทําไมถ้าใจคิดจะรัก

altTitles.ja: 現実の彼女はいりません!

description.en: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school eroge otaku who's given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he's bought a bunch of new material in consequence of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be used goods, he encounters a delinquent-like-looking girl being about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who's got all kind of rumors about her, especially that she's used goods. And it appears that she's set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.
description.ja: 三次元に興味ナシのオタクな高校生・新宮清一は、ひょんなことから学校一の不良少女・綾女古都子に告白される。当然の如くこれを断固拒否！　……した清一だったが、古都子は「じゃあ、お前の理想になってやるよ！」とメインヒロインのようなツインテ美少女に変貌して、強引なアプローチで迫り始め…？
description.pt: Aramiya Seiichi é um estudante ordinário… Um otaku dos eroges que perdeu todas as esperanças nas garotas em 3D devido um certo incidente. Um dia, após ele comprar alguns materiais novos devido uma frustração em consequência de uma experiência frustrante com uma "personagem perfeita" de um eroge, ele encontra uma garota delinquente prestes a ser estuprada por um grupo de homens. Por um acaso ele acaba salvando ela, e por este acaso a sua vida acaba mudando completamente...
description.ru: Когда Сейчи учился в младших классах, он получил психическую травму из-за некой девушки. С тех самых пор, он с недоверием относится к девушкам, и испытывает отвращение к не девственницам. Сейчас Сейчи эроге-отаку, ученик старшей школы, однажды вечером он оказывается свидетелем попытки изнасилования девушки группой людей, случайно привлекая внимания насильников, он использует смекалку и успешно спасает себя и девушку. Девушка оказывается известной хулиганкой, и о ней часто ходят не очень хорошие слухи, а что не менее важно, девушка эта – одноклассница Сейчи, Аямэ. После того дня, она влюбляется в главного героя, и решает добиться его расположения любым способом. Видя потуги девушки, учительница Сейчи просит его помочь Аямэ стать нормальной девушкой, на что тот неохотно соглашается. Так и начинается история о парне, который пытается исправить хулиганку, попутно устраняя все нажитые ею слухи, и о девушке, которая хочет любви.

title.en: The Hidden Side of My Shy Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: 内気な幼馴染の裏の顔

altTitles.ja-ro: Uchiki na Osananajimi no Ura no Kao

title.en: TS Boys With Unexpectedly Beautiful Girl Moves.

altTitles.ja: 不意に美少女ムーブが出るTS男子

altTitles.ja-ro: Fui ni Bishoujo Move ga Deru TS Danshi

altTitles.en: Genderswapped Boys Who Unexpectedly Do Beautiful Girl Moves

description.en: Sasazuka Kazuharu (16) wakes up on the day of his job interview to find out that he has transformed into a girl.
description.id: Seorang anak lelaki yang bangun di pagi hari dan mendapatinya dirinya telah berubah menjadi seorang gadis pada hari interview kerja paruh waktunya.

title.en: Otomege Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới Otomegame Thật Khắc Nghiệt Với Nhân Vật Quần Chúng

altTitles.th: ชีวิตตัวประกอบอย่างตูช่างอยู่ยากเมื่ออยู่ในโลกเกมจีบหนุ่ม

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲー世界はモブに厳しい世界です

altTitles.ko: 여성향 게임 세계는 엑스트라에게 어려운 세상입니다

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.ru: Мир отомэ-игр — это тяжёлый мир для мобов

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Dating Sim: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs

altTitles.fr: Mon Destin... Entre Les Mains Des Femmes

altTitles.zh-hk: 女性向遊戲世界對路人角色很不友好

altTitles.en: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs

description.en: Leon, a former Japanese worker, was reincarnated into an “otome game” world, and despaired at how it was a world where females hold dominance over males. It was as if men were just livestock that served as stepping stones for females in this world. The only exceptions were the game’s romantic targets, a group of handsome men led by the crown prince. In these bizarre circumstances, Leon held one weapon: his knowledge from his previous world, where his brazen sister had forced him to complete this game. This is a story about his adventure to survive and thrive in this world.
description.ja:
転生したら「女尊男卑」な、乙女ゲー世界でした!!!

モブからだって成り上がれ！
イケメン死すべし！
剣と魔法の異世界ファンタジー!!!

▼
剣と魔法の“乙女ゲー"の世界に転生した、
元日本の社会人だったリオンは、その女尊男卑な世界に絶望する。

この世界では、男なぞは女性を養うだけの家畜のようなものであった。
例外なのは、ゲームで攻略対象であった王太子率いるイケメン軍団ぐらいである。

そんな理不尽な境遇において、リオンはある一つの武器を持っていた。
前世で生意気な妹に無理矢理攻略させられていたこのゲームの知識である。

本当は田舎に引きこもりのんびりとしたいリオンだったが
その知識を使い、やりたい放題の女どもとイケメンに、はからずも反旗を翻すのだった。
ド外道主人公による、爽快(?)下克上ファンタジー、コミカライズでも開演!

(Source: コミックウォーカー)
description.pt-br: Leon, um ex-trabalhador japonês, reencarnou em um mundo de “otome game” e se desesperou com a forma como era um mundo onde as mulheres detêm o domínio sobre os homens. Era como se os homens fossem apenas animais que serviram como degraus para as fêmeas neste mundo. As únicas exceções eram os alvos românticos do jogo, um grupo de homens bonitos liderados pelo príncipe herdeiro. Nestas circunstâncias bizarras, Leon tem apenas uma arma: seu conhecimento do seu mundo anterior, que ele obteve após completar o jogo, depois de ser forçado por sua irmã a jogá-lo. Leon, que realmente só quer viver tranquilamente na periferia do país, usa seu conhecimento para bater de frente contra as mulheres e esses homens bonitos.

altTitles.ja: 放課後の本屋さん

description.en: When school is over, Tsubasa, an elementary schooler, works at her grandfather's bookstore. The books they provide are of a slightly lewd kind, which is just a little bit of trouble for an elementary schooler.

altTitles.ja: 容疑者Aの花嫁

description.en: The "erotic love suspense" manga centers on Hana, who returns to her family after her husband dies. She lives every day in an oppressive atmosphere, until one day her parents start talking about having a marriage interview for her with a globally renowned artist named Aoi.
description.ja: 夫を亡くし、実家に戻った羽菜。息苦しい毎日を送っていたある日、世界的に有名な画家・蒼井重瑠との見合い話が持ち上がる。今の生活から逃れるために、蒼井との再婚を受け入れた羽菜だけど…彼は、前妻3人を殺した連続殺人事件の容疑者で――！？

altTitles.ja: 甘々シンデレラ

altTitles.vi: Những nàng lọ lem ngọt ngào của tiệm bánh

description.en: "I want my little sister to eat a cake!" Minori, a male college student, decided to work part-time at a super popular cake shop with that in mind. The shop is located inside a school for young ladies!? Can a boy bad at communicating, who can't even look straight in the eye and speak properly run a cake shop with four JK patissiers? Enjoy a teen romantic comedy sweeter than a cake♪
description.ja:
妹にケーキを食べさせたい！」その一心で超人気洋菓子店でのバイトを始めることに決めた男子大学生のみのり。しかしその店があるのはなんと“お嬢様学校の中”！？　まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障男子がJKパティシエ4人とともにお店を切り盛りできるのか？　ケーキよりも甘～い青春ラブコメをご賞味あれ!

まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障大学生の季村みのり。妹にケーキを食べさせたい一心で超人気洋菓子店でバイトに応募したがそこはなんとお嬢様学校の構内にある店だった！　春宮苺、夏野もも、秋山林檎、冬月みかん、４人のJKパティシエと一緒にお店を切り盛りすることに!?

altTitles.ja: 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる

altTitles.zh: 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦

description.en:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
description.ja:
人気絶頂を誇ったゲームでもその寿命は限られている。実に15年もの歳月を一つのゲームにぶち込んだガチ勢・「淀水アムロ」は、ゲーム内で人生を賭けた一世一代の大博打に挑戦するがあえなく失敗。全てを失い気を失ったアムロが目覚めた所は、リリース初期の15年前だった。回帰前と同じ轍は踏まないと誓うアムロ。全てを知り尽くしたソシャゲ廃人は、最強のニュービーとして蘇る！

description.ko:
서비스 종료까지 앞으로 15년.
오직 나만이 엔딩을 알고 있다.

'나는 고인물이다'

description.ru:
До конца игры 15 лет. И только мне известно, как всё произойдет. – Я мертвая вода!

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01Gu-5Hahfw)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%B3%EA%B3%A0%EB%8B%B3%EC%9D%80-%EB%89%B4%EB%B9%84/2446)

description.zh:
沉浸在虚拟游戏中的35岁宅男李煜阳不仅众叛亲离、借贷负债，还在游戏中赌输了唯一能还债的机会，在他绝望之际竟然阴差阳错穿越回了15年前，此时游戏还只是测试版，一切才刚刚开始，借此机会李煜阳想要改变人生，咸鱼翻身，踏上致富之路……凭借着十几年的经验与记忆，他脱下盔甲和内裤，决心站在游戏之巅，单纯地享受这一切！然而这一次，他会走向怎样的未来呢？

altTitles.ja: うたかたのうた
午前2時まで君のもの

description.en: Michio has liked his close friend Kyoichi ever since their school days. Having never confessed his feelings, their platonic relationship continues as he turns 21. When Michio awakens one morning, he finds the world around him unfamiliar. He is 29, and the sleeping face next to his is… From Okuda Waku comes a lovely, heartrending, post-midnight countdown love story.

title.en: Saint Seiya - Another Story of Hades: Dark Wing

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢 冥王異伝 ダークウィング

altTitles.ja-ro: Seinto Seiya Meiō Iden Dāku Uingu
Saint Seiya: Meiou Iden - Dark Wing

altTitles.pt-br: Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: Outra História de Hades - Asa Negra

description.en: A high school student suffers an accident and wakes up in Elysium, the World of the Dead. In search of answers, he meets Hades, the God of the Underworld, who sends him on a mission only he can fulfill.
description.pt-br: Um estudante do ensino médio sofre um acidente e acorda em Elysium, o Mundo dos Mortos. Na procura de respostas, ele conhece Hades, o Deus do Submundo, que manda ele em uma missão que somente ele pode completar.

description.en: The hottest and most popular model on SNS these days, Choi Bom. Born with a good-looking appearance, he accidentally became a trend, posting a job offer for a housekeeper on his SNS. And after a while, a man comes to visit saying that he will work as a housekeeper... His best friend and first love, who disappeared 7 years ago ...

altTitles.ja: ガンニバル

description.en: When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

altTitles.ja: マイホームヒーロー

description.en: For the sake of his family, an average middle-aged man must go against a crime syndicate, by all means necessary.
description.ja: 頼れる妻と、ちょっと反抗期気味だけど可愛い高校生の娘。鳥栖哲雄の人生はそれなりに幸せだった。娘の顔に殴打の傷を見つけるまでは。
description.pt: Pelo bem de sua filha, um homem de meia idade embarca na jornada de sua vida.
description.tr: Orta yaşlarında bir baba kızı ve ailesi uğruna her şeyi yapmaya hazır; suç karteline karşı koymak da buna dâhildir!
description.pt-br: Pelo bem de sua filha, Tetsuo de 47 anos embarca de uma vez em algo irremediável.

altTitles.ja: テンカイチ -日本最強武芸者決定戦-

altTitles.zh: 天下第一 日本最強武士選拔賽

altTitles.zh-hk: 天下第一 日本最强武士选拔赛

altTitles.vi: Tenkaichi - Thiên Hạ Đệ Nhất Võ Sĩ Đại Hội

altTitles.es-la: Tenkaichi - El luchador de artes marciales más fuerte de Japón.

altTitles.es: Tenkaichi - El luchador de artes marciales más fuerte de Japón.

altTitles.en: Tenkaichi: Battle to Decide Japan's Strongest Martial Artist

altTitles.pt-br: Tenkaichi - A Batalha para decidir o Artista Marcial mais forte do Japão

altTitles.en: The Greatest: The Battle To Decide Japan's Strongest Martial Artist

description.en: Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan
description.ja: 時は西暦1600年。“織田信長”が全国統一してから10年が経過していた――。信長は自分の死期を悟ると、最強の武芸者を輩出したものに“この国”を譲ると発表。天下統一の夢破れた武将たちは、それぞれ最強の武芸者を擁立し、この国の王を目指す！
description.vi:
Một câu chuyện với một chuỗi lịch sử hoàn toàn lạ lẫm với lịch sử mà chúng ta đã và đang từng được biết.
Oda Nobugana, sau khi hoàn thành đại nghiệp thống nhất thiên hạ, nay chỉ vì muốn nhìn thấy cảnh chém giết đổ máu, đã lập nên một giải đấu nhằm chọn ra người sẽ thay mình trị vì cả thiên hạ, "TENKAICHI". Để tham gia, những văn võ bá quan lẫn các trung thần đều sẽ chọn ra cho mình một võ sĩ đại diện, người mà họ cho rằng sẽ là thiên hạ đệ nhất võ sĩ tham gia thi đấu cho mình. Một đại hội đẫm máu và tàn khốc chưa từng có trong lịch sử Nhật Bản chính thức bắt đầu.
description.es-la: Torneo de batalla ambientado en la Era Sengoku. Es el año 1600. Han pasado diez años desde que Oda Nobunaga unificó Japón. Cuando Nobunaga se dio cuenta de que se estaba muriendo, anunció que entregaría el país a quien produjera los guerreros más fuertes. Los señores de la guerra, cuyos sueños de unificar el país se habían visto frustrados, crearon sus propios guerreros más fuertes y pusieron sus miras en convertirse en el gobernante de Japón
description.pt-br: “Quem é o artista marcial mais forte do Japão?” É 1600 D.C., dez anos se passaram desde que "Oda Nobunaga" unificou todo o país. Percebendo sua morte, Nobunaga anuncia que entregará 'este país' àquele que tivesse como seguidor o artista marcial mais forte.

description.en: Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

altTitles.ja: グレートマジンガー
金剛大魔神

description.en: Great Mazinger starts after the defeat of Mazinger Z. Tetsuya Tsurugi is the new protagonist, piloting the powerful Great Mazinger, a creation of the once thought dead Kenzo Kabuto, the father of Koji Kabuto. This time the enemy is the Mycene Empire and its powerful robots.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun.
Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

The struggle between Kamou-kun, who doesn't want to be bothered, and Katabami-san, who craves attention, begins anew today!

---

**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)

title.en: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier

altTitles.ja: ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア

description.en:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

altTitles.ja: タルタロス劇場ワイルド

description.en: Collection of 4-komas centered around Persona 3, 4, 5 and their various spinoff games.

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.pt-br: Quatro meninas sapecas ocupa ilegalmente o antigo salão de festas tradicional da cerimônia do chá, a fim de criar o "Club de diversões." Estes patifes ... que ignoram as advertências repetidas - em rebelião direta com as ordem de justiça do Conselho de Estudantes - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente saia seus vagabundos para fazerem alguma coisa! Neste manga ligeiramente lento, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas partiram de suas casas para um passeio em conjunto com dias cheios de um pouco disso e daquilo!

title.en: Shin Megami Tensei Apocrypha: War of the Dove

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Megami Tensei Gaiten - Hato no Senki

altTitles.ja: 真・女神転生外典 鳩の戦記

description.en: A standalone story set in the larger Megami Tensei universe. Our hero Hato is just an ordinary schoolboy, until one day he receives a ~~Command Spell~~ Stigma on his left hand, forges a contract with ~~Lancer~~ Cu Chulainn to become his master, and is unwittingly dragged into a city-wide Holy ~~Grail~~ War.

altTitles.ja: ナヴィガトリア

description.en: Enter a world where the First Space War has ended, and Earth has claimed its first extraterrestrial colony. Manabu Houo, a boy born into a totalitarian state, finds his only joy in watching forbidden movies with his childhood friend, Hina-chan. However, one day upon returning home, he finds a group of government officials waiting for him...?! Watch as this thrilling sci-fi school drama unfolds on a distant planet!

altTitles.ja: テラフォーマーズ

description.en:
With the space program attempting to travel to Mars, 21st century scientists were tasked with warming up the planet so that humans could survive on its surface. They came up with an efficient and cost effective plan of sending cockroaches and mold to the surface so that the mold would absorb the sunlight and the insect corpses would serve as a food source for the mold.  
It is now the year 2599, and the first manned ship to Mars has landed on the planet and the six crew members are ready for their mission. But what they find on Mars, is something beyond their darkest imagination and fear…

title.en: Tensei Shitara Joban de Shinu Nakabosudatta ―Hiroin Kenzoku-ka de Ikinokoru―

altTitles.ja: 転生したら序盤で死ぬ中ボスだった ―ヒロイン眷属化で生き残る―

altTitles.en: When I Reincarnated, I was a Mid-boss Who Died Early in the Game ―Survive by Becoming a Household Member with Heroine―

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Joban de Shinu Naka Boss datta – Heroine Kenzokuka de Ikinokoru

description.en:
When I woke up after an accident, I was reincarnated as a mid-boss destined to die in the early stages of the game! In order to avoid being killed by the hero who should come attacking soon, I will fight and make the women my subordinates to increase my allies! 

An exhilarating fantasy of survival in another world!

Novel description for more info (MTL):
Toyo Akutsu unfortunately died in an accident, but the next moment he was somehow reincarnated in the world of a famous RPG as Ashnord, the weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings. At this rate, he will lose to the hero and die. Even if they are miraculously defeated, the heroes can raise their level and return. In order to survive, he has no choice but to use the forbidden bug technique ``Betrayal Bug'' to make the hero's group his followers and control their bodies and minds. Will Akutsu (Ash) be able to subjugate all the heroines, build a harem, and survive the death event...?
description.ja:
事故に遭って目が覚めたら、ゲームの序盤で死ぬ中ボスに転生!
やがて襲ってくるはずの勇者に殺されないために、××して女たちを眷属にして仲間を増やせ!
興奮必至の異世界サバイバルファンタジー!

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3298hj)

title.en: Tsugi wa Anata ga Yarareru Ban Death.

altTitles.ja: 次はアナタがヤられる番です。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi wa Anata ga Yarareru Ban desu.

altTitles.es-la: Ahora es tu turno de ser derrotado.

altTitles.en: Next, it's Your Turn to be Killed

description.en:
The normal high school life came to an abrupt end when an armed group invaded. The students are toyed with by men who control the high school with firearms in their hands. An orgy of sex and death unfolds there. What awaits beyond that... Erotic suspense horror begins.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64650)
description.ja:
当たり前の高校生活は武装した集団が侵入してきたことによって唐突に終わりを告げた。銃器を手にし高校を支配した男たちに生徒たちは弄ばれる。そこに展開される性と死の狂宴。その先に待つものは――。エロティックサスペンスホラー、開幕。

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64650)
description.es-la: Una vida normal en la secundaria pero llegó a un abrupto final cuando un grupo armado invadió. Los hombres armados que gobiernan la escuela secundaria juegan con los estudiantes. Allí se desarrolla una fiesta de sexo y muerte.

title.en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

title.en: Isekai de Pension Hajimemashita. Sekai de Yuiitsu no Kuro Majo desu ga, Kono Chikara wa Okyaku-sama no Tame ni Tsukaimasu

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Pension Hajimemashita. Sekai de Yuiitsu no Kuro Majo desu ga, Kono Chikara wa Okyaku-sama no Tame ni Tsukaimasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界でペンション始めました。 世界で唯一の黒魔女ですが、この力はお客様のために使います

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 펜션을 시작했습니다. 세계 유일의 흑마녀입니다만, 이 힘은 고객님을 위해 쓰겠습니다.

description.en: I lost my life in a fire at my workplace and found myself reborn in another world. My name in this life is Lunan. Moreover, according to my black cat master, I am a "black witch" and have the power to change the fate of the world. But I have a dream that I want to fulfill more than that. Yes, I want to run a "pension" where any guest can rest in peace. A fantasy of hospitality in a different world, depicting interactions with fluffy guests!

title.en: Satsuriku no Kuindeddo – 7-nin no Onna Shikeishuu

altTitles.ja: Satsuriku no Queen Dead – Nananin no Onna Shikeishuu
殺戮のクインデッド -7人の女死刑囚-

description.en: Deep Palace is a prison island that houses only death row inmates. A young girl, Akari, was kept in the "Deep Palace" for a certain purpose... One day, the death row inmates suddenly start killing each other! A battle royale called the “Killing” is taking place where prisoners can do whatever they want as they remain the last ones standing! In the face of this pandemonium, will Akari be able to safely survive the "Killing" and escape from the prison?!

altTitles.ja: 出遅れテイマーのその日暮らし

altTitles.en: The Life and Times of a Late Bloomer Tamer

description.en: The Law of Justice Online, also known as LJO, is the hottest new VRMMORPG of the season, and office worker Yuta Sasaki is one of the lucky few granted access to the official launch. After some careful research, Yuta is chomping at the bit to start his virtual life as a Tamer, a class that harnesses the powers of wild monsters. Luckily, upon building his character, Yuta manages to land not only his chosen class, but a heap of bonuses to boot! He soon finds, however, that his abilities are not all they're cracked up to be, and that the talents of the rare first monster he is granted lie not in combat...but gardening! Already well behind the other adventurers, and facing a long and slow progression path ahead of him, Yuta is left with two choices—start over from scratch, or make the best of what he has been given. For Yuta the choice is obvious: When life gives you manure...start up a farm!

altTitles.en: Lovetrap Island - Passion in Distant Lands -

altTitles.ja: 恋獄島 ～極地恋愛～

description.en:
Five travelers, 3 women and 2 men, wash ashore a remote island, survivors of ship sinking.

Finding themselves in this extreme situation, their instinct and conscience intersect and collide!
Crossing thoughts, feelings of love and hate mixed with trust and betrayal. A story of uncontrollable libido and murderous intent…

Original R18 web novel [here](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1896br/)

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Tochi wo Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.en: Let's Buy the Land And Cultivate in Different World

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en: As our humble corporatist Itonami Norio is suddenly summoned to another world, it would look as if he'll be sent to a battlefield– he, however, holds no skill to speak of, and as he is deemed to be useless. He negotiates with The King and receives a plot of land – an empty, deserted plot of land, with no inhabitant in sight. Norio holds something he couldn't bring himself to tell anyone: The Master of Supremacy, a gift which will grant him the most comfortable of lives in this world. Hereby begins the Norio's colorful story – having a mermaid he fishes declare herself his wife, becoming neighbors with the Undead King, this is his busy but enjoyable life – and now a dragon appears ?!

altTitles.ja: 異世界チートサバイバル飯

description.en: Kazusa Yuu, a Japanese high school student interested in food and camping, dies in a traffic accident and ends up reincarnated in the wilderness in another world. He must learn to survive in an unfamiliar environment, learn the powers he was granted and the magic of the world that is based on eating other creatures, and rescue fair maidens in distress to feed them and build up his harem.
description.pt: Kazusa Yuu, é um estudante japonês do ensino médio interessado em comida e camping, ele morre em um acidente de trânsito e acaba reencarnando no deserto em outro mundo. Ele deve aprender a sobreviver em um ambiente desconhecido, aprender os poderes que ele recebeu e a magia do mundo que se baseia em comer outras criaturas e resgatar donzelas em perigo para alimentá-las e construir seu harém.
description.pt-br: Kazusa Yuu, um estudante japonês do ensino médio interessado em culinária e campismo, morre num acidente de trânsito e acaba reencarnado na selva de outro mundo. Ele deve aprender a sobreviver num ambiente desconhecido, aprender sobre os poderes que ganhou e a magia do mundo que se baseia em comer outras creaturas e resgatar donzelas em perigo para as alimentar e construir o seu harém

altTitles.ja: メタリアルストーリー

description.en: Metalia, a world where mechanical creatures called the gears stroll. It was the so-called "machine hunters (collectors)" who hunted those who ruled the earth with mighty power. A boy now descends in Melzam, the largest city in Metaria. His name is Nill. He, with the right arm of the machine, had a secret. This is a story that looks for your fate.

title.en: Kimi to Sekai ga Owaru Hi ni

altTitles.en: Love You as the World Ends

altTitles.ja: 君と世界が終わる日に

description.en: On the day of his proposal, Hibiki Mamiya, a young man, is trapped in a tunnel collapse accident. When he narrowly escapes from the tunnel, the world has completely changed. A dilapidated cityscape, countless bodies, and the "living dead" wandering around the city... Amidst this abnormal situation, Hibiki desperately searches for his lover, but he is nowhere to be found. Will the few survivors survive together in this hopeless situation? The manga is based on the television drama, "Love You as the World Ends".

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.ja: 生徒会にも穴はある!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

title.en: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Sa ở tiệm thuốc

altTitles.en: Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk

altTitles.fr: Le quotidien de Sa-Chan, une vendeuse comme une autre

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

title.en: Rise of the Kowtowing Girl ~Sacrificial Revenge Game~

altTitles.ja: 土下座少女の下剋上 ～生贄リベンジゲーム～

altTitles.en: The Ascendance of the Dogeza Girl ~Sacrifice Revenge Game~

description.en: In a mysterious school, there is a class where students with the lowest grades are sent, named the "isolated class". Akari, an ordinary female student, falls into the "isolated class" due to her friend's betrayal, where she is exposed to irrational senseless violence! However, she stands up to the members who dominate the class with an unyielding heart. At the same time, Akari joins forces with Yuto, another student who has fallen into the segregated class, and vows to climb out of this mess...

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

altTitles.ja: 生きてるうちに推してくれ

description.en:
A new frontier drawn by Mr. Niwa of Tokusatsu Gagaga! Fans are only spirits!  ?  Idol on the edge of the cliff, exorcist started-
 Since childhood, Misaki Kira has been a loner because of her ability to "see" strange things. When she came to Tokyo to change her life, she was scouted and debuted as an idol! Start your glittering idol life!  When you think about it, the only ones who can help you are spirits... Life as an idol doesn't go well, and on the day before he gets fired, he meets a priest with mysterious powers!? An exorcist unit comedy by a precipice idol and a fishy boy!

title.en: Blade Skill Online: Gomi Shokugyou de Saijaku Bukide Kuso Status no Ore, Itsunomanika "Last Boss" ni Nariagarimasu!

altTitles.ja: ブレイドスキル・オンライン
ブレイドスキル・オンライン～ゴミ職業で最弱武器でクソステータスの俺、いつのまにか『ラスボス』に成り上がります！～

description.en:
The weakest piece of shit is the final boss!?
Overwhelmingly unlucky high school student Yuri. What he obtained was the VRMMO 『Blade Skill Online』, which could be used to change the luck value. "Summoner", which is considered to be the strongest occupation on the capture site, and "Bow", the strongest weapon. Furthermore, play the game world with extreme "luck value"! ――It should have been, but I was forced to grab false information!
The summoner is a garbage job, the bow is the weakest weapon, and the luck value is a fucking status!? Moreover, as a result of random character creation, the avatar is a beautiful girl!? Before I knew it, I was treated as
the last boss for some reason— !?

title.en: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya

altTitles.en: Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!

altTitles.es-la: La madre demonio indefensa frente a la lindura de su hijo

altTitles.zh: 儿子可爱过头的魔族母亲

altTitles.ja: 息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親

altTitles.ko: 아들이 귀여워서 어쩔 수 없는 마족엄마

altTitles.tr: Oğlunun Tatlılığına Karşı Koyamayan Bir Şeytan Anne

description.en:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
description.tr: Bir iblisin kötü günlerini arkada bırakarak, anne olma yolundaki adımlarını anlatan sevimli bir seri.
